data.lyric:
[ti:Eastside]
[ar:Benny Blanco/Halsey/Khalid]
[al:Eastside]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.93]Eastside - Benny Blanco/Halsey/Khalid
[00:01.84]Khalid：
[00:07.65]Uh
[00:10.21]Yeah yeah
[00:11.14]When I was young I fell in love
[00:13.41]We used to hold hands man that was enough yeah
[00:16.63]Then we grew up started to touch
[00:18.82]Used to kiss underneath the light on the back of the bus yeah
[00:21.88]Oh no your daddy didn't like me much
[00:24.22]And he didn't believe me when I said you were the one
[00:27.30]Oh every day she found a way out of the window to sneak out late
[00:31.28]She used to meet me on the Eastside
[00:33.47]In the city where the sun don't set
[00:36.57]And every day you know that we ride
[00:38.31]Through the backstreets of a blue Corvette
[00:41.90]Baby you know I just wanna leave tonight
[00:45.15]We can go anywhere we want
[00:47.19]Drive down to the coast jump in the sea
[00:50.10]Just take my hand and come with me
[00:54.01]We can do anything if we put our minds to it
[00:56.57]Take your whole life then you put a line through it
[00:59.24]My love is yours if you're willing to take it
[01:01.86]Give me your heart 'cause I ain't gonna break it
[01:04.39]So come away starting today
[01:06.72]Start a new life together in a different place
[01:09.19]We know that love is how all these ideas came to be
[01:11.77]So baby run away with me
[01:14.73]Halsey：
[01:15.30]Seventeen and we got a dream to have a family
[01:18.24]A house and everything in between
[01:19.79]And then oh suddenly we turned twenty-three
[01:22.45]Now we got pressure for taking our life more seriously
[01:25.12]We got our dead-end jobs and got bills to pay
[01:28.47]Half our friends are now are enemies
[01:30.65]Now I I'm thinking back to when I was young
[01:33.15]Back to the day when I was falling in love
[01:35.20]He used to meet me on the Eastside
[01:37.31]In the city where the sun don't set
[01:40.63]And every day you know where we ride
[01:42.31]Through the backstreets in a blue Corvette
[01:45.55]And baby you know I just wanna leave tonight
[01:49.04]We can go anywhere we want
[01:51.10]Drive down to the coast jump in the sea
[01:54.12]Just take my hand and come with me
[01:57.01]Singing
[01:57.50]Halsey/Khalid：
[01:57.86]We can do anything if we put our minds to it
[02:00.42]Take your whole life then you put a line through it
[02:03.23]My love is yours if you're willing to take it
[02:05.74]Give me your heart 'cause I ain't gonna break it
[02:08.38]So come away starting today
[02:10.61]Start a new life together in a different place
[02:13.31]We know that love is how all these ideas came to be
[02:15.92]So baby run away with me
[02:19.25]Run away now
[02:20.63]Run away now
[02:21.99]Run away now
[02:24.57]Run away now
[02:25.85]Run away now
[02:27.24]Run away now
[02:28.24]Halsey：
[02:28.50]He used to meet me on the Eastside
[02:30.84]Khalid：
[02:33.95]She used to meet me on the Eastside
[02:36.76]Halsey：
[02:39.28]He used to meet me on the Eastside
[02:41.58]Khalid：
[02:44.51]She used to meet me on the Eastside
[02:46.83]In the city where the sun don't set
data.trans:
[ti:Eastside]
[ar:Benny Blanco/Halsey/Khalid]
[al:Eastside]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.93]//
[00:01.84]//
[00:07.65]//
[00:10.21]//
[00:11.14]当我年轻时谈恋爱
[00:13.41]牵牵手感觉已经足够
[00:16.63]后来我们慢慢长大 开始学会爱抚
[00:18.82]总是在公交车后座的黑暗里偷偷接吻
[00:21.88]你的爸爸并不是很中意我
[00:24.22]当我说你就是我命中注定的人时 他并不相信我
[00:27.30]每天晚上她都想办法从窗户溜出来
[00:31.28]我们总是在东区见面
[00:33.47]在那座城市 太阳不会下山
[00:36.57]你知道 每天我们都驾驶一辆
[00:38.31]蓝色Corvette穿过街道
[00:41.90]宝贝 你知道我 今天就想离开
[00:45.15]我们可以去任何想去的地方
[00:47.19]驶向海岸 跳入海里
[00:50.10]只需牵着我的手 跟我出发
[00:54.01]只要我们用心 什么事情都能做到
[00:56.57]你控制着自己的人生 并在外围画上了线
[00:59.24]如果你想拿走 我的爱全部属于你
[01:01.86]把你的心给我 因为我永远不会使它破碎
[01:04.39]所以 今天就出发吧
[01:06.72]我们一起去一个新的地方 开始新生活
[01:09.19]我们明白 爱情就是这样产生
[01:11.77]所以 宝贝 与我一起逃离吧
[01:14.73]//
[01:15.30]十七岁的我们梦想着组建一个家庭
[01:18.24]有一座房子 还有里面的一切
[01:19.79]忽然间我们就二十三岁了
[01:22.45]现在我们更加严肃地对待我们的生活 压力也更大
[01:25.12]我们做着没什么前途的工作 要还很多账单
[01:28.47]半数朋友已经成为了敌人
[01:30.65]现在我回想着年轻时候
[01:33.15]回到我们刚刚相爱的日子
[01:35.20]我们总是在东区见面
[01:37.31]在那座城市 太阳不会下山
[01:40.63]你知道 每天我们都驾驶一辆
[01:42.31]蓝色Corvette穿过街道
[01:45.55]宝贝 你知道我 今天就想离开
[01:49.04]我们可以去任何想去的地方
[01:51.10]驶向海岸 跳入海里
[01:54.12]只需牵着我的手 跟我出发
[01:57.01]唱歌
[01:57.50]//
[01:57.86]只要我们用心 什么事情都能做到
[02:00.42]你控制着自己的人生 并在外围画上了线
[02:03.23]如果你想拿走 我的爱全部属于你
[02:05.74]把你的心给我 因为我永远不会使它破碎
[02:08.38]所以 今天就出发吧
[02:10.61]我们一起去一个新的地方 开始新生活
[02:13.31]我们明白 爱情就是这样产生
[02:15.92]所以 宝贝 与我一起逃离吧
[02:19.25]现在就逃离
[02:20.63]现在就逃离
[02:21.99]现在就逃离
[02:24.57]现在就逃离
[02:25.85]现在就逃离
[02:27.24]现在就逃离
[02:28.24]//
[02:28.50]我们总是在东区见面
[02:30.84]//
[02:33.95]我们总是在东区见面
[02:36.76]//
[02:39.28]我们总是在东区见面
[02:41.58]//
[02:44.51]我们总是在东区见面
[02:46.83]在那座城市 太阳不会下山
